summary: The sword for our favorite youtuber ever, Pewdiepie! The sword has sound clips from pewds himself, so have fun slashing your way through hoards of bandits along side the great barrel slayer.
descriptionHtml:
The sword for our favorite youtuber ever, Pewdiepie! The sword has sound clips from pewds himself, so have fun slashing your way through hoards of bandits along side the great barrel slayer.

This is also on the steam workshop if you prefer to get it from there.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=116279952

The sword used by the legend himself.... PEWDIEPIE. 
This legendary sword was used by him to purge the world from the barrel menace. Go to the Barrels HQ located outside Fort Graymoor to retrieve the legendary swords from a fallen BARREL. 

Brofist to Pewdiepie, ive been subbed to u since i cant remember when. KEEP BEIN AWESOME PEWDIE. 

This mod is sponsored by Stephano 

***********IMPORTANT************* 
THE DAMAGE IN THE SCREENSHOT IS NOT BECAUSE THE WEAPON IS OVERPOWERED I JUST HAVE MAXED OUT ONEHAND. 

Answers for your questions: 
What does it do? 
A sword that basicly just uses Pewdiepie dialouge and makes you look awesome. 

Where is it? 
read the description 

Can i hate and troll on this mod? 
Yes but you will be blocked. :)
author: Dovahcake or Krit Rawkets on Steam
